title: Gingerbread cut-out biscuits
ingredients: ['225g butter', '200g caster sugar', '1 egg', '350g black treacle', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '625g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarb of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cloves']
